attributes.action: Make St.Georges day a national holiday.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Why can't the English have a day to be proud of?

rejection.details:
There is a similar petition at:
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/EnglandSaint/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
